art.author: cher
art.post: I just saw the film. It was ok. I think the concept is interesting, but it could have explained things a little better. I would have enjoyed it more if the film delved deeper into what was going on in the world after the birth of the cloned boy. It was an ok film, and I didn’t feel like I wasted my time watching it..
art.title: The Film – I’m Not Jesus Mommy

misc.author: cher
misc.post: I just saw the film. I watched it because I found the concept interesting. The film was ok. It could have explained things a little better. I would have enjoyed it more if it delved deeper into what happened to the world after the cloned boy was born. The acting was good though. I didn’t feel like I wasted my time watching it..
misc.title: More on the movie: I’m Not Jesus Mommy
